value.title: Toxic workplace in Kamala Harris’ office mirrors campaign woes
value.excerpt: A report by Politico outlining the dysfunction and toxic environment in Vice President Kamala Harris’ office recalls similar stories about the final days of her 2020 presidential campaign.

value.title: Kamala Harris silent on SCOTUS ruling on lawsuit that started while she was state AG
value.excerpt: SCOTUS ruled 6-3 against the rule started under Harris

value.title: Kamala Harris' chief of staff, criticized for tough tactics, built reputation while working for Bill Clinton
value.excerpt: Kamala Harris' chief of staff blocked out longtime aides and allies from connecting with Bill Clinton while she ran his post-White House office.

value.title: Meghan McCain pans leaker on Kamala Harris' staff: 'Running to Politico like a little b--ch'
value.excerpt: "The View" co-host Meghan McCain flamed the anonymous leaker responsible for claims of internal tensions amongst Vice President Kamala Harris' staff, which were originally reported by Politico on Wednesday.

value.title: Kamala Harris: 'Gender equality strengthens democracy'
value.excerpt: Gender equality strengthens democracy' Posted . Women deprived of freedom of speech or the freedom to vote should fight for their rights and know that t

value.title: Harris chief of staff Tina Flournoy fought to shield Big Tobacco from liability as Philip Morris exec: memos
value.excerpt: Vice President Kamala Harris' chief of staff, Tina Flournoy, worked to shield Big Tobacco companies from liability for the public health costs resulting from their products, documents reviewed by Fox News show.

value.title: ‘Not a healthy environment’ — Kamala Harris’ office rife with dissent
value.excerpt: There is dysfunction inside the VP’s office, aides and administration officials say. And it’s emanating from the top.

value.title: Emily Compagno: Kamala Harris' border trip was 'just for PR to get the media off her back'
value.excerpt: Fox News contributor Emily Compagno said on "The Big Saturday Show" that Vice President Kamala Harris' border trip was "just for PR to get the media off her back."

value.title: Sen. Hagerty says Harris border trip is sign that ‘backlash of public opinion’ is pushing Biden admin to act
value.excerpt: Sen. Bill Hagerty, R-Tenn., says that Vice President Kamala Harris’ long-awaited trip to Texas is a sign that the Biden administration is reacting to a "backlash of public opinion" due to its handling of the crisis at the southern border -- as he accused the government of "window dressing" a strategy

value.title: NJ school official who called Kamala Harris ‘street walker,’ receives ‘no confidence’ vote: reports
value.excerpt: A school board member in New Jersey has received a "no confidence" vote from colleagues despite his apology for referring to Vice President Kamala Harris as a "street walker," according to reports.

value.title: Kamala Harris' El Paso Visit Signals Departure From Trump Border Policies
value.excerpt: Biden officials told reporters that Harris chose El Paso as a symbolic reminder of the previous administration's controversial immigration policies.

value.title: Psaki says Harris' border visit is to places where Trump-era policies were 'so problematic'
value.excerpt: White House press secretary Jen Psaki said that Vice President Kamala Harris had chosen to visit El Paso in the southern border region because it was the place where Trump-era immigration policies were “so problematic.”

value.title: Kamala Harris isn't living up to liberal media's 'wish fantasy': Tammy Bruce
value.excerpt: Vice President Kamala Harris entered the White House with glowing coverage from mainstream media outlets celebrating her historic accomplishment as the first woman of color to hold the office. That coverage seems to have shifted,

value.title: White House: 'Appropriate time' for Kamala Harris border visit after VP dismissed it as 'grand gesture'
value.excerpt: The White House on Wednesday said it is the "appropriate time" for Vice President Kamala Harris to make the trip to the U.S.-Mexico border, maintaining that timing is not driven by former President Donald Trump's upcoming visit.

value.title: In Central America, Kamala Harris ignored our best hope: Catholic bishops
value.excerpt: The Central American bishops are strong opponents of abortion and gay marriage, but they have also prophetically denounced exploitation of the poor and government corruption. In t

value.title: Cornyn calls on Biden and Harris to visit southern border: 'Y'all come visit'
value.excerpt: Sen. John Cornyn (R-Texas) has called on President Biden and Vice President Harris to visit the U.S.- Mexico border amid an ongoing surge of immigrants.

value.title: Republicans block 'rotten' election reform bill in Senate as VP Harris presides over debate
value.excerpt: Senate Republicans Tuesday blocked sweeping legislation on election and campaign finance reforms that Democrats said is crucial is ensuring voting rights and saving democracy but Republican blasted as a partisan federal takeover of elections.

value.title: Nina Simone's grandaughter says Kamala Harris 'bullied' her mother to the point she 'almost killed herself'
value.excerpt: Legendary singer Nina Simone’s granddaughter accused Vice President Harris of causing the family to lose control of Simone's estate.

value.title: Pence criticizes Harris over declining to visit US-Mexico border
value.excerpt: Former Vice President Mike Pence took aim at his successor on Friday at a conference for religious conservatives in Florida, criticizing Vice President Kamala Harris for declining to visit the US-Mexico border during a recent immigration-focused trip to Central America.

value.title: Cruz rips Kamala Harris for avoiding border trip on 'Fox & Friends': Like a ‘comedy show’
value.excerpt: Ted Cruz, R- Texas, slammed the Biden administration for its inaction at the southern border on " Fox & Friends " Friday. Sen. Cruz said Vice President Kamala Harris ' failure to visit the border and avoidance of the topic is becoming like "a comedy show.

value.title: Watch Live: Vice President Kamala Harris and Treasury Secretary Janet Yellen discuss $1.3 billion aid program for small businesses
value.excerpt: The Rapid Recovery Program will disburse nearly $1.3 billion in funds to community development institutions to help small businesses.

value.title: VP Kamala Harris Announces Small Business Program: "We Must Re-Imagine Our Economy"
value.excerpt: AP: Vice President Kamala Harris announced Tuesday that the Biden administration is distributing $1.25 billion to hundreds of community lenders in an effort to help boost the economic recovery from the coronavirus for small businesses and disadvantaged business owners.

value.title: Mike Pence Tells Kamala Harris 'It's Time' to Visit Southern Border
value.excerpt: Donald Trump's former VP criticized Harris while tweeting images of him visiting the border during his time in the office.

value.title: California Latino Caucus rebukes Harris for 'do not come' immigration warning
value.excerpt: California Latino lawmakers issued a statement Wednesday rebuking Vice President Kamala Harris’ controversial comments in El Salvador this week when she told “folks” from the northern triangle states "Do not come."

value.title: Mollie Hemingway calls out Kamala Harris' nervous laugh when facing tough questions
value.excerpt: The Federalist Senior Editor Mollie Hemingway said on Wednesday that Vice President Kamala Harris laughs “nervously” when challenged by journalists, reacting to an interview the former senator had with NBC journalist Lester Holt.

value.title: Tucker Carlson: How Did Kamala Harris Wind Up Effectively In Charge Of The United States?
value.excerpt: Two years ago, during the Democratic presidential primaries, Kamala Harris appeared on CNN to explain where she stood in the race. At that moment, Harris had just been memorably humiliated by Tulsi Gabbard of Hawaii during a televised debate,

value.title: White House says Harris 'may go to the border' 'at some point'
value.excerpt: Vice President Kamala Harris “may go to the border” “at some point,” the White House said Tuesday, as the vice president faces criticism for not yet visiting the southern border after being tappen by President Biden to handle the “root causes” of migration.

value.title: Kamala Harris' Guatemala comments would've led media to brand her a 'racist' 6 months ago, Gutfeld says
value.excerpt: Vice President Kamala Harris issued cautionary remarks directed people who may seek to illegally immigrate to the US through the southern border, which Greg Gutfeld commented that those remarks would be considered racist during the Trump administration on "The Five".

value.title: Harris faces first major diplomatic test
value.excerpt: Vice President Kamala Harris is facing the first major diplomatic test of her vice presidency as she looks to tackle the root causes of migration toward the US in her full day of meetings in Guatemala.

value.title: VP Kamala Harris visits Latin America to tackle migration, corruption
value.excerpt: The Biden administration is expected to announce new measures to fight smuggling and trafficking, and hopes to announce additional anti-corruption efforts.
